job_title: Technical Marketing Engineer Evangelist Intern (2024 Intake)
job_description: Even the most groundbreaking tech company can’t rest on its laurels. In Technical Marketing at Dell Technologies, we’re focused on increasing our product sales and expanding the company's market share. We achieve this by developing innovative marketing solutions and communications that clearly articulate the technical and business advantages of our market-leading products and services. Our technically savvy audience want facts not frills, so we write industry white papers, customer presentations, articles and pre-sales material that tell people exactly what they want to know. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as Technical Marketing Engineer Evangelist Intern on our Technical Marketing Team in Singapore What you’ll achieve As a Technical Marketing Engineer Evangelist Intern, you will be responsible for communicating deep customer insights into the product development process and develop and delivering key messaging and content to drive preference for Dell's Edge Solutions. You will: Work with sales, partners and customers to support customer opportunities familarise to deliver Demos, execute POC’s and educate/evangelize Dell's Edge products and solutions Familarise on acting as a spokesperson at key market events Familarise on Training sales, partners, and customers on our solutions Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements Strong written and verbal communications skills Ability to take very technical concepts and translate into layman terms and business outcomes Desirable Requirements Experience with Edge applications and/or deployments Familiarity with Dell products Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us.
